1#include "NodeGraphicsObject.hpp"
2
3#include "ConnectionGraphicsObject.hpp"
4#include "ConnectionState.hpp"
5#include "FlowScene.hpp"
6#include "Node.hpp"
7#include "NodeConnectionInteraction.hpp"
8#include "NodeDataModel.hpp"
9#include "NodePainter.hpp"

12#include <QtWidgets/QGraphicsEffect>
13#include <QtWidgets/QtWidgets>
14#include <cstdlib>
15#include <iostream>
16using QtNodes::FlowScene;
17using QtNodes::Node;
18using QtNodes::NodeGraphicsObject;
19NodeGraphicsObject::NodeGraphicsObject(FlowScene &scene, Node &node) : _scene(scene), _node(node), _locked(false), _proxyWidget(nullptr)
20{
21 _scene.addItem(this);
22 setFlag(QGraphicsItem::ItemDoesntPropagateOpacityToChildren, true);
23 setFlag(QGraphicsItem::ItemIsMovable, true);
24 setFlag(QGraphicsItem::ItemIsFocusable, true);
25 setFlag(QGraphicsItem::ItemIsSelectable, true);
26 setFlag(QGraphicsItem::ItemSendsScenePositionChanges, true);
27 setCacheMode(QGraphicsItem::DeviceCoordinateCache);
28 auto const &nodeStyle = node.nodeDataModel()->nodeStyle();
29 {
30 auto effect = new QGraphicsDropShadowEffect;
31 effect->setOffset(4, 4);
32 effect->setBlurRadius(20);
33 effect->setColor(nodeStyle.ShadowColor);
34 setGraphicsEffect(effect);
35 }
36 setOpacity(nodeStyle.Opacity);
37 setAcceptHoverEvents(true);
38 setZValue(0);
39 embedQWidget(true);
40 // connect to the move signals to emit the move signals in FlowScene
41 auto onMoveSlot = [this] {
42 _scene.nodeMoved(_node, pos());
43 };
44 connect(this, &QGraphicsObject::xChanged, this, onMoveSlot);
45 connect(this, &QGraphicsObject::yChanged, this, onMoveSlot);
46}
47NodeGraphicsObject::~NodeGraphicsObject()
48{
49 _scene.removeItem(this);
50}
51Node &NodeGraphicsObject::node()
52{
53 return _node;
54}
55Node const &NodeGraphicsObject::node() const
56{
57 return _node;
58}
59void NodeGraphicsObject::embedQWidget(bool embed)
60{
61 NodeGeometry &geom = _node.nodeGeometry();
62 _node.nodeDataModel()->setWembed(embed);
63 if (auto w = _node.nodeDataModel()->embeddedWidget())
64 {
65 if (embed)
66 {
67 if (nullptr == _proxyWidget)
68 {
69 _proxyWidget = new QGraphicsProxyWidget(this);
70 w->setParent(nullptr);
71 _proxyWidget->setWidget(w);
72 _proxyWidget->setPreferredWidth(5);
73 geom.recalculateSize();
74 if (w->sizePolicy().verticalPolicy() & QSizePolicy::ExpandFlag)
75 {
76 // If the widget wants to use as much vertical space as possible, set
77 // it to have the geom's equivalentWidgetHeight.
78 _proxyWidget->setMinimumHeight(geom.equivalentWidgetHeight());
79 }
80 _proxyWidget->setPos(geom.widgetPosition());
81 update();
82 _proxyWidget->setOpacity(1.0);
83 _proxyWidget->setFlag(QGraphicsItem::ItemIgnoresParentOpacity);
84 }
85 }
86 else
87 {
88 if (nullptr != _proxyWidget)
89 {
90 _proxyWidget->setWidget(nullptr);
91 QPoint pos = QCursor::pos();
92 _proxyWidget->deleteLater();
93 _proxyWidget = nullptr;
94 connect(this, SIGNAL(destroyed()), w, SLOT(deleteLater()));
95 geom.recalculateSize();
96 update();
97 w->setWindowTitle(_node.nodeDataModel()->caption());
98 w->setWindowFlags(Qt::Widget);
99 w->move(pos.x(), pos.y());
100 w->show();
101 w->raise();
102 }
103 }
104 }
105 moveConnections();
106 scene()->update();
107}
108QRectF NodeGraphicsObject::boundingRect() const
109{
110 return _node.nodeGeometry().boundingRect();
111}
112void NodeGraphicsObject::setGeometryChanged()
113{
114 prepareGeometryChange();
115}
116void NodeGraphicsObject::moveConnections() const
117{
118 NodeState const &nodeState = _node.nodeState();
119 for (PortType portType : { PortType::In, PortType::Out })
120 {
121 auto const &connectionEntries = nodeState.getEntries(portType);
122 for (auto const &connections : connectionEntries)
123 {
124 for (auto &con : connections) con.second->getConnectionGraphicsObject().move();
125 }
126 }
127}
128void NodeGraphicsObject::lock(bool locked)
129{
130 _locked = locked;
131 setFlag(QGraphicsItem::ItemIsMovable, !locked);
132 setFlag(QGraphicsItem::ItemIsFocusable, !locked);
133 setFlag(QGraphicsItem::ItemIsSelectable, !locked);
134}
135void NodeGraphicsObject::paint(QPainter *painter, QStyleOptionGraphicsItem const *option, QWidget *)
136{
137 painter->setClipRect(option->exposedRect);
138 NodePainter::paint(painter, _node, _scene);
139}
140QVariant NodeGraphicsObject::itemChange(GraphicsItemChange change, const QVariant &value)
141{
142 if (change == ItemPositionChange && scene())
143 {
144 moveConnections();
145 }
146 return QGraphicsItem::itemChange(change, value);
147}
148void NodeGraphicsObject::mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
149{
150 if (_locked)
151 return;
152 // deselect all other items after this one is selected
153 if (!isSelected() && !(event->modifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier))
154 {
155 _scene.clearSelection();
156 }
157 for (PortType portToCheck : { PortType::In, PortType::Out })
158 {
159 NodeGeometry const &nodeGeometry = _node.nodeGeometry();
160 // TODO do not pass sceneTransform
161 int const portIndex = nodeGeometry.checkHitScenePoint(portToCheck, event->scenePos(), sceneTransform());
162 if (portIndex != INVALID)
163 {
164 NodeState const &nodeState = _node.nodeState();
165 std::unordered_map<QUuid, Connection *> connections = nodeState.connections(portToCheck, portIndex);
166 // start dragging existing connection
167 if (!connections.empty() && portToCheck == PortType::In)
168 {
169 auto con = connections.begin()->second;
170 NodeConnectionInteraction interaction(_node, *con, _scene);
171 interaction.disconnect(portToCheck);
172 }
173 else // initialize new Connection
174 {
175 if (portToCheck == PortType::Out)
176 {
177 auto const outPolicy = _node.nodeDataModel()->portOutConnectionPolicy(portIndex);
178 if (!connections.empty() && outPolicy == NodeDataModel::ConnectionPolicy::One)
179 {
180 _scene.deleteConnection(*connections.begin()->second);
181 }
182 }
183 // todo add to FlowScene
184 auto connection = _scene.createConnection(portToCheck, _node, portIndex);
185 _node.nodeState().setConnection(portToCheck, portIndex, *connection);
186 connection->getConnectionGraphicsObject().grabMouse();
187 }
188 }
189 }
190 auto pos = event->pos();
191 auto &geom = _node.nodeGeometry();
192 auto &state = _node.nodeState();
193 if (_node.nodeDataModel()->resizable() && geom.resizeRect().contains(QPoint(pos.x(), pos.y())))
194 {
195 state.setResizing(true);
196 }
197}
198void NodeGraphicsObject::mouseMoveEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
199{
200 auto &geom = _node.nodeGeometry();
201 auto &state = _node.nodeState();
202 if (state.resizing())
203 {
204 auto diff = event->pos() - event->lastPos();
205 if (qAbs(diff.x()) < 1 && qAbs(diff.y()) < 1)
206 {
207 event->ignore();
208 return;
209 }
210 if (auto w = _node.nodeDataModel()->embeddedWidget())
211 {
212 prepareGeometryChange();
213 const QSize size = w->size();
214 QSize newSize = size + QSize(diff.x(), diff.y());
215 const QSize minSize = geom.minimumEmbeddedSize();
216 const QSize maxSize = geom.maximumEmbeddedSize();
217 if ((newSize.width() < minSize.width() && newSize.height() < minSize.height()) ||
218 (newSize.width() > maxSize.width() && newSize.height() > maxSize.height()))
219 {
220 event->ignore();
221 return;
222 }
223 newSize = newSize.expandedTo(minSize);
224 newSize = newSize.boundedTo(maxSize);
225 w->resize(newSize);
226 geom.recalculateSize();
227 _proxyWidget->setMinimumSize(newSize);
228 _proxyWidget->setMaximumSize(newSize);
229 _proxyWidget->setPos(geom.widgetPosition());
230 update();
231 moveConnections();
232 event->accept();
233 }
234 }
235 else
236 {
237 QGraphicsObject::mouseMoveEvent(event);
238 if (event->lastPos() != event->pos())
239 moveConnections();
240 event->ignore();
241 }
242 QRectF r = scene()->sceneRect();
243 r = r.united(mapToScene(boundingRect()).boundingRect());
244 scene()->setSceneRect(r);
245}
246void NodeGraphicsObject::mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
247{
248 auto &state = _node.nodeState();
249 state.setResizing(false);
250 QGraphicsObject::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
251 // position connections precisely after fast node move
252 moveConnections();
253 _scene.nodeClicked(node());
254}
255void NodeGraphicsObject::hoverEnterEvent(QGraphicsSceneHoverEvent *event)
256{
257 // bring all the colliding nodes to background
258 QList<QGraphicsItem *> overlapItems = collidingItems();
259 for (QGraphicsItem *item : overlapItems)
260 {
261 if (item->zValue() > 0.0)
262 {
263 item->setZValue(0.0);
264 }
265 }
266 // bring this node forward
267 setZValue(1.0);
268 if (auto w = _node.nodeDataModel()->embeddedWidget())
269 {
270 w->raise();
271 }
272 _node.nodeGeometry().setHovered(true);
273 _node.nodeDataModel()->onNodeHoverEnter();
274 update();
275 _scene.nodeHovered(node(), event->screenPos());
276 event->accept();
277}
278void NodeGraphicsObject::hoverLeaveEvent(QGraphicsSceneHoverEvent *event)
279{
280 _node.nodeGeometry().setHovered(false);
281 _node.nodeDataModel()->onNodeHoverLeave();
282 update();
283 _scene.nodeHoverLeft(node());
284 event->accept();
285}
286void NodeGraphicsObject::hoverMoveEvent(QGraphicsSceneHoverEvent *event)
287{
288 auto pos = event->pos();
289 auto &geom = _node.nodeGeometry();
290 if (_node.nodeDataModel()->resizable() && geom.resizeRect().contains(QPoint(pos.x(), pos.y())))
291 {
292 setCursor(QCursor(Qt::SizeFDiagCursor));
293 }
294 else
295 {
296 setCursor(QCursor());
297 }
298 event->accept();
299}
300void NodeGraphicsObject::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
301{
302 QGraphicsItem::mouseDoubleClickEvent(event);
303 _scene.nodeDoubleClicked(node());
304}
305void NodeGraphicsObject::contextMenuEvent(QGraphicsSceneContextMenuEvent *event)
306{
307 _scene.nodeContextMenu(node(), mapToScene(event->pos()));
308}
